text: Norwich City F.C. is an English football club based in Norwich, Norfolk. The club was started in 1902. They were relegated from the Premier League in the 2021-22 season. The manager is Dean Smith. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 First Division 15th 2001/02 First Division 6th 2002/03 First Division 8th 2003/04 First Division 1st 2004/05 Premiership 19th 2005/06 League Championship 9th 2006/07 League Championship 16th 2007/08 League Championship 17th 2008/09 League Championship 22nd 2009/10 League One 1st 2010/11 League Championship 2nd 2011/12 Premier League 12th 2012/13 Premier League 11th 2013/14 Premier League 18th 2014/15 Sky Bet Championship 3rd 2015/16 Premier League 19th 2016/17 Sky Bet Championship 8th 2017/18 Sky Bet Championship 14th 2018/19 Sky Bet Championship 1st 2019/20 Premier League 20th 2020/21 Sky Bet Championship 1st === Former position === Category:Premier League clubs Category:Norwich Category:1902 establishments in Europe Category:1900s establishments in England
title: Norwich City F.C.
